java.util.ArrayList.get.description: Returns the element at the specified position in this list.

java.util.ArrayList.size.description: Returns the number of elements in this list.

java.time.LocalDate.now.description:
Obtains the current date from the system clock in the default time-zone.
 
 This will query the system clock in the default
 time-zone to obtain the current date.
 
 Using this method will prevent the ability to use an alternate clock for testing
 because the clock is hard-coded.

java.util.ArrayList.add.description: Appends the specified element to the end of this list.
